main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(max) Declare @bigsql varchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[Usp_GetRatingAgencyReport]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GetRatingAgencyReport] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --USP_GetRatingAgencyReport --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GetRatingAgencyReport] @PoolId varchar(10) , @LTVPassNo varchar(10) , @PivotCount tinyint = 0
AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
declare @DimPoolId bigint set @DimPoolId = CAST(@PoolId as bigint)
declare @Temp table (DimPoolId bigint not null, DimConsolidationID bigint not null, DimLoanId bigint not null, SeqNo int not null, LTVPassNo nvarchar(200) not null, DimSecurityId bigint, PRIMARY KEY(DimConsolidationID, DimLoanId, DimSecurityId, LTVPassNo) )
insert @Temp select FC.DimPoolID, FC.DimConsolidationID, FCL.DimLoanId, FCS.SecurityRank as SeqNo, FC.LTVPassNo, FCS.DimSecurityId from tblFactConsolidation FC inner join tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FC.DimPoolID = FCL.DimPoolID and FC.DimConsolidationID = FCL.DimConsolidationID and FC.LTVPassNo = FCL.LTVPassNo inner join tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS on FC.DimPoolID = FCS.DimPoolID and FC.DimConsolidationID = FCS.DimConsolidationID and FC.LTVPassNo = FCS.LTVPassNo where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo
;WITH x AS ( select T.DimConsolidationID, T.DimLoanId, T.DimSecurityId, SeqNo, DS.SecurityNo, DS.PropertyTypeDesc, DS.PostCode, DS.Suburb, DS.State, DS.Region, DS.Nature, DS.OccupancyPurposeDesc, DS.ValuationType, FS.SecurityValuationAmt, FS.SecurityValuationDate, DS.Tenure from @Temp T left outer join tblFactSecurity FS on T.DimPoolID = FS.DimPoolID and T.DimSecurityId = FS.DimSecurityID left outer join tblDimSecurity DS on FS.DimPoolID = DS.DimPoolID and FS.DimSecurityId = DS.DimSecurityID
)
SELECT CONVERT(datetime, cast(fc.DimReportingDateId as varchar), 112) as ReportingDate ,dl.OrganisationCode ,dt.TrustID ,dls.SoldSecuritisationNo as SoldSecuritisationNumber ,fc.DimPoolId as PoolCutID ,fc.ConsolidationNo as PostConsolidationID ,fl.AccountNo ,dl.LoanStatus ,fl.CurrentPrincipalBalance ,fl.CurrentLimit ,fl.CurrentLoanBalance ,fl.OriginalLoanBalance ,dls.CustomerCode as CustomerNumber ,dls.ResidentDesc as BorrowerResidency ,dls.FirstHomeBuyerInd as FirstHomeBuyerIndicator -- ,dls.InvolvementType as EmploymentType , '''''''' as EmploymentType ,dl.MortgageInsuranceInd as MortgageInsuranceIndicator ,dl.MortgageInsurerCode as MortgageInsurer ,fl.LoanStartDate ,fl.Seasoning ,fl.LoanMaturityDate , CASE WHEN dl.OrganisationCode = ''''AUS'''' THEN fl.IPANXExpDate ELSE null END as IPANXExpDate ,fl.LoanCloseDate ,fl.OriginalTerm ,fl.RevisedOriginalTerm ,fl.RemainingTerm ,dls.OriginalBrand ,dl.ProductCode ,dl.ProductDescription ,dls.OffsetIndicator ,dl.InterestRateTypeCode ,cast((fl.CurrentRate * 100) as decimal(15, 6)) as CurrentRate ,dl.PaymentTypeCode ,fl.FixedRateEndDate ,fl.RemainingFixedTerm as FixedRateRemainingTerm ,fl.InterestOnlyExpiryDate --,CASE --WHEN dl.OrganisationCode = ''''NZD'''' THEN fl.InterestOnlyExpiryDate --ELSE null --END as InterestOnlyExpiryDate --,fl.IOExpDate as TIF_IOExpiryDate -- ,fl.IPANXIOExpDate -- ,fl.IPANXExpDate ,fl.InterestOnlyRemainingTerm ,dls.PurposeDesc as LoanPurposeDescription ,dls.DocumentType as DocumentTypeCode ,dls.PaymentFrequency ,fl.PaymentAmount ,fl.AmountOfArrears as ArrearsAmount ,fl.DaysInArrears ,CASE WHEN dl.ScrubbedFlag = ''''Y'''' THEN dl.ScrubbedFlag ELSE '''''''' END as AuditCodePass ,dls.CrossCollateralisationFlag , dls.SelfEmploymentIndicator -- ,'''''''' as SPARE1 -- ,'''''''' as SPARE2 -- ,'''''''' as SPARE3 -- ,'''''''' as SPARE4 -- ,cast(cast(fc.ConsolidationOriginalLTV * 100 as decimal(15, 4)) as varchar(20)) as OriginalLTV ,cast(fc.ConsolidationValuation as decimal(15, 4)) as PostConsolidationTotalSecurityValue ,fc.SecurityCount as PostConsolidationNumberOfSecurity ,cast(cast(fc.ConsolidationLTV * 100 as decimal(15, 2)) as varchar(20)) as PostConsolidationLTV ,cast(cast(fc.ConsolidationLimitLTV * 100 as decimal(15, 2)) as varchar(20)) as PostConsolidationLimitLTV ,cast(fc.ConsolidationBalance as decimal(15, 4)) as PostConsolidationCurrentPrincipalBalance ,cast(fc.ConsolidationLimitBalance as decimal(15, 4)) as PostConsolidationCurrentLimit ,fc.LoanCount as PostConsolidationNumberOfAccounts
, t1.SecurityNo as MainSecurity_SecurityNumber , t1.PropertyTypeDesc as MainSecurity_PropertyTypeDescription , CASE WHEN dl.OrganisationCode = ''''NZD'''' THEN t1.Tenure ELSE null END as MainSecurity_TenureCode , CASE WHEN dl.OrganisationCode = ''''AUS'''' THEN t1.Nature ELSE null END as MainSecurity_Nature , CASE WHEN dl.OrganisationCode = ''''AUS'''' THEN t1.OccupancyPurposeDesc ELSE null END as MainSecurity_OccupancyPurposeDescription , t1.PostCode as MainSecurity_PostCode , t1.Suburb as MainSecurity_Suburb , t1.State as MainSecurity_State , t1.Region as MainSecurity_Region , cast(t1.SecurityValuationAmt as decimal(15, 4)) as MainSecurity_ValuationAmount , t1.SecurityValuationDate as MainSecurity_ValuationDate , t1.ValuationType as MainSecurity_ValuationType
FROM dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC INNER JOIN dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL ON FC.DimPoolId=FCL.DimPoolId And FC.DimConsolidationId=FCL.DimConsolidationId And FC.LTVPassNo=FCL.LTVPassNo inner JOIN dbo.tblFactLoan FL ON FCL.DimLoanId=FL.DimLoanId And FCL.DimPoolId=FL.DimPoolId inner JOIN dbo.tblDimLoan DL ON FL.DimLoanId=DL.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolId=DL.DimPoolId inner JOIN dbo.view_DimTrust dt on fl.DimTrustID = dt.DimTrustID left outer join dbo.tblDimLoanSupplementary dls on dl.DimLoanID = dls.DimLoanID left join (select * from x where x.SeqNo = 1) t1 on fc.DimConsolidationID = t1.DimConsolidationID and dl.DimLoanId = t1.DimLoanId
WHERE fc.DimPoolId = @DimPoolId AND fc.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo
END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
